description:
A requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested to CAAWC Trenton.

Item 1, 1670, NSN: 1670-99-138-1944, 
Cargo Net Aerial Delivery (5000lbs)
Part No.: HU10-0094900, NCAGE: K2429

Quantity: 30, Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to be delivered to CAAWC Trenton.

bidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the brand name and model and/or Part Number and the NCAGE they are offering.
full_summary:
# Cargo Net Aerial Delivery (5000lbs)

## Tender Details

* **Solicitation Number**: [W8485-258216/A](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/39382/w8485-258216.a---request-for-proposal---canada-buys-%28en.pdf)
* **Reference Number**: cb-352-71671764
* **Date of Publication**: June 3, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: July 19, 2024 (2:00 p.m. ET)
* **Contract Type**: Goods procurement
* **Contract Value**: Not specified
* **Duration of Contract**: Expected contract start date: July 5, 2024, expected end date: March 31, 2025

## Tender Description

The Department of National Defence is seeking proposals for the procurement of cargo nets for aerial delivery, with a total load capacity of 5000 pounds. The required equipment includes 30 units of cargo nets, with a specific National Stock Number (NSN) of 1670-99-138-1944. Deliveries are to be made to the Canadian Forces Aerospace Warfare Centre (CAAWC) Trenton, with a projected delivery date by November 2024.

## Terms and Conditions

* Proposals must include a detailed description of the cargo net, including the brand name, model, part number, and North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) code.
* Bidders are encouraged to transmit their bids electronically using the epost Connect service.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

## Contracting Authority

The contracting authority for this procurement is the Department of National Defence. The contact person for this tender is:

* Dan Lebel
* Email: [dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca](mailto:dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca)
* Phone: (000) 000-0000

## Notice URL

Not applicable.
